amendment.description: To require certain Federal agencies to establish consistent policies relating to forest biomass energy to help address the energy needs of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3140 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3140 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Collins to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S482-484; text as modified: CR S483) To require certain Federal agencies to establish consistent policies relating to forest biomass energy to help address the energy needs of the United States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3140 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3140 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Collins to Amendment SA 2953.
